sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sn_otd_regex"> <sn_otd_regex action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <description>Remove crazy m-dash</description> <order>250</order> <pattern>\s+&#8211;</pattern> <replace> -</replace> <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-07 21:01:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>570b2b1bdbc7df0017fb5275ca96190f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-09-22 13:12:09</sys_updated_on> </sn_otd_regex> </record_update>
